articles.author: Cat Zakrzewski
articles.title: Vance pushes ‘America First’ AI agenda, accuses allies of overregulation - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Donald Trump has taken dramatic executive action to advance policies that benefit tech companies. Now Vice President JD Vance is advancing that message on the world stage.
articles.content: PARIS Vice President JD Vance promised Tuesday that the Trump administration would prioritize U.S. leadership in artificial intelligence, delivering sharp criticism of the European Unions sweeping ef… [+3771 chars]
